page.title: 18The Survey And Food
page.content:
MAIN SHOPPING CENTRES WERE: Maldon 21.0% of families. Chelmsford 26.0% of families. Witham 28.0% of families. Colchester 13.0% of families. Southend 0.5% of families. South Woodham 1.5% of families. Tiptree 3.0% of families. Braintree 3.0% of families. Wickham Bishops 3.0% of families. Basildon 0.5% of families. Kelvedon 0.5% of families. AS TO GROWING THEIR OWN FOOD: Grow none 41.2% Grow a little 47.5% Grow a lot 10.5% Grow most 00.8% Grow all 00.0%
85% of people picked strawberries from local farms. 90% had milk delivered, 30% bread.
